Hello!

I build useful software and help others do the same

My main focus is on my job of Director of Engineering, leading the technical team at Drivy, the largest european peer to peer car rental company. Aside from this, I provide dedicated coaching for various early stage startups, including YC alumni companies. Finally, I'm also teaching online (OpenClassrooms) or in front of students (HETIC, HEC...)

I've also been blogging for the past 5 years. If you'd like to get a feel of what I've had my mind on, you can take a look at a few of my most successful articles:

  • Don't Simply Be The Manager You'd Love To Have (Management, 2017)
  • Generate Sounds Programmatically With Javascript (Development, 2016)
  • My Tech Advisor Role At Birdly (YCombinator W16) (Coaching, 2016)
  • Vim Configuration From Scratch in 2016 (Development, 2016)
  • Deadlines And Estimates In Startups (Project Management, 2015)
  • Tips & Tricks Learned Releasing an Hybrid App Using Steroids.js (Development, 2014)
  • Developers, Share Your Technical Knowledge (Coaching, 2013)
  • The Risks of Working With Another Company's API (Development, 2012)

You can reach me via @marcgg on Twitter, my LinkedIn account or my email "marcg.gauthier-at-gmail-dot-com". If you want to hire me, please check out this page before contacting me.
